item.title: Minecraft Random MOTD Selector
item.description: A lightweight PowerShell micro‑project that randomly selects and writes a MOTD to disk at each server restart, supports date‑based overrides for special events, and uses simple text files for phrases and colour codes—making it a fun, community‑driven addition to your MC monitoring workflow.
